author: gcolvin
content:
Hey there.  @vbuterin, <@403707149043105803> and I have been discussing, over in the graveyard,  some simplifications to memory and stack accounting that could stand more participants.  I'd like to see Vitalik's proposal to radically simplify memory move forward
https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/812719315136675850/1113498967624396811
and I've long wanted to remove the hard limit on stack
